intro: Medinilla astronioides, commonly known as the velvet tangerine or velvet tangerine orchid, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Ericaceae and is characterized by its striking, velvety red or purple flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has glossy, elliptical leaves and thrives in warm, humid environments with indirect sunlight. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
